name: Zero Hour - The Last Hope
description:
You are the last ship in the galaxy. 

No help is coming - its only you, and the Synthetics. Fight your way past 13 waves of enemies, find the legendary Super Laser, and blast your way to the center of the Sythentic horde - The All Knowing Brain!

Play with multiple new weapon pickups, various enemies, and a true challenge in a simple game!
